Name: Meilin
Village_Settlement: There are a total of approximately 450 people living in Meilin village.
Surname_Groups: The main surname group is the Wen 温.
Village_Temples: 1) Xinxing longshê 新兴龙社: The main gods are Zunzhu mingwang尊主明王, Houtu furen 后土夫人, and Xieshun shenghou 协顺圣侯. Secondary gods include Jin jiangjun 金将军 and Wu jiangjun 吴将军. 2) Wanlingting 万林亭 is dedicated to Guanyin dashi 观音大士.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/7 the gods of Xinxing longshê 新兴龙社 are taken on a procession around the village. Opera is performed, and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rites. The village organizes the event and funds are collected on a per capita basis.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 7/23: The birthday celebration of Xieshun shenghou 协顺圣侯 (Zhanggong shengjun 张公圣君). Opera is performed, and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rites. The village organizes the event and funds are collected on a per capita basis.
